creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: nude male figure leaning against a tree, holding fruit in PL hand; city scene behind to R
marks: Signature, Date, Stamp monogram in plate, upper right, in reverse: [ICB]
provenance: Albert van Loock (b. 1917, Brussels); John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn.; by descent to his daughters, Elizabeth, Katie, and Julie. Earlier provenances have been gathered, but further research will increase our knowledge of their histories.
title: Adam
